alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Real (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 6:30PM CDT until June 20 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN EDWARDS AND NORTHWESTERN REAL COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Vance, or 12 miles southeast of Rocksprings, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Edwards and northwestern Real Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
